question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. chef on the right
B. national flag
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The 2D image makes it ambiguous whether the chef on the right or the national flag is closer, as both are in the mid-to-far background with overlapping visual elements, requiring depth cues to resolve.
